summary: This document is a correspondence from TD Ameritrade regarding the status of a new account for Jeffrey Epstein. It confirms that his account is under review and that he will be contacted if additional information is needed.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual for whom the new account is being reviewed by TD Ameritrade.

persons.name: Donny C.
persons.context: Donny C. is the representative from TD Ameritrade who is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein regarding his account.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is the client whose account is being managed by Donny C. from TD Ameritrade.

keyFacts: The document is a notification regarding the status of a new account for Jeffrey Epstein.
The account is currently under review by TD Ameritrade.
Donny C. is the representative handling the account.
Epstein will be contacted if additional information is required within 2-3 business days.
The correspondence emphasizes the importance of privacy and account security.
